channel.title: Incident Reporting 2 on CIP Reporting

item.title: Why CIP Reporting
item.description: Increase compliance Eliminating manually-intensive, paper-based processes lowers the risk of errors and ensures the work is correct every time. Go Paperless Our electronic management of documentation and workflow means that paper records are no longer needed. Audit Trail Tracking of all information including edit history, assignments, and approvals enables complete and accurate reporting. Automated, Centralized Solution CIP Reportingâ€™s centralized solution with conditional workflow logic ensures your team is always following the right protocol.
